alert.note: Alert for La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 3:44PM EST until February 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte County. In Michigan, Berrien County. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. Most of the snow accumulation is expected tonight through midday Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will dip into the upper teens late tonight into early Saturday taking wind chills down in the 0 to 5 degree above zero range. A period of gusty west to northwest winds to 30 mph is expected behind a cold front later this evening into the early overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
